mapper.insert: INSERT INTO planManagement (planNum, memberEmail, subject, planColor, sDate, eDate, repeatCheck, repeatCycle, memo, regDate) VALUES (planManagement_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{subject}, #{planColor}, #{sDate}, #{eDate}, #{repeatCheck}, #{repeatCycle}, #{memo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT planNum, memberEmail, subject, planColor, sDate, eDate, repeatCheck, repeatCycle, memo, regDate FROM planManagement
memberEmail = #{memberEmail} AND ( ( ( TO_DATE(sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{sDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_DATE(#{eDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) ) OR ( repeatCheck=1 AND repeatCycle!=0 AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 12 * repeatCycle*TRUNC(((SUBSTR(#{sDate},1,4)-SUBSTR(sDate,1,4))/repeatCycle))) >= TO_DATE(#{sDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 12 * repeatCycle*TRUNC(((SUBSTR(#{sDate},1,4)-SUBSTR(sDate,1,4))/repeatCycle))) <= TO_DATE(#{eDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM planManagement WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail} AND planNum = #{planNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE planManagement SET subject=#{subject}, planColor=#{planColor}, sDate=#{sDate}, eDate=#{eDate}, repeatCheck=#{repeatCheck}, repeatCycle=#{repeatCycle}, memo=#{memo}, regDate=SYSDATE WHERE planNum=#{planNum} AND memberEmail=#{memberEmail}
